name: Four Directions Educational Consulting Services (4DECS)
description: This organization provides culturally responsive school counseling and college planning strategies for Native American students. They offer services to Indian Education programs, school and college counselors, and college access programs
services: American-Indian-owned Admissions guidance in Delaware consultation

name: College Horizons
description: College Horizons is a non-profit organization that supports the higher education of Native American students by providing college and graduate admissions workshops. They work with students nationwide to help them with college admissions and financial aid
services: American-Indian-owned Admissions guidance in Delaware consultation

name: Delaware Nation
description: While headquartered in Oklahoma, the Delaware Nation offers "College & Career Resources For Indigenous Students" and may be a resource for information or referrals
services: American-Indian-owned Admissions guidance in Delaware consultation

name: International Consultants of Delaware, Inc. (ICD)
address: While their website does not list a specific street address for Delaware, they are a NACES member and have a Philadelphia office. Their services are global
description: ICD is an expert in credentials evaluation for education, employment, immigration, licensure, and certification. This service is crucial for international students or those with foreign credentials applying to US institutions. They are a member of NACES
services: American-Indian-owned Admissions guidance in Delaware consultation
